description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Play with CRAZY particles! Activate special effects to make the CRAZY particles even more CRAZY! Change the CRAZY Color, Speed, Size, Angle and Gravity direction.
